q1: Are Paris SG the best team in France
a1: They are the only team in France !
q2: Are they better than the France national team?
a2: I don't think so, since France won the 2018 World Cup.
q3: Can Engald beat Paris Sg this year/
q4: Can Paris SG beat some national teams?
a4: Yes, if they concentrate on team cohesion.
q5: Who is your favorite Paris SG player?
a5: ALAIN ROCHE | 1992-98 | A dominant defender, Roche spent six years at PSG and won the Cup Winners' Cup before later taking up a sporting-director role at the club.
